oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame Hits Music Library
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an advertisement for the Hall of Fame A Cappella Package and the Country Music Hall of Fame Hits Music Library, announced by Lee Cash, by Together of Memphis, Tenn.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement for Music From The Country Music Hall of Fame -- various recordings from the Hall of Fame's music collection -- Lee Cash highlights some of the superstars of the collection -- Uncle Dave Macon comedy routine [recording, excerpt] -- Wildwood Flower (Carter Family) [recording, excerpt] -- T For Texas (Jimmie Rodgers) [recording, excerpt] -- Lee Cash advertises the Hall of Fame A Cappella Package -- Lee Cash advertises the Country Music Hall of Fame Hits Music Library -- various recordings from the Hall of Fame's music collection -- Lee Cash advertises the Country Music Hall of Fame Hits Music Library -- Closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
